1073880.name: Cold Cable: Lifeshift Demo
1073880.description:
Take role as a survivor in COLD CABLE: LIFESHIFT. After the Hope Garden ore mining started, a new sickness spread trough the living: part of population exposed to it become monsters! Yea, and it's up to you to discover what's going on and most important: how to fix that BIG problem.

CCLS is a 3D First Person action-puzzle game, with survival elements, where you have to gather supplies, control radiation level and shoot monsters on your way to reach the next level. If you want to play this game, get ready for the chaos.
1073880.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
